wsform-mwoption-bad-range: No page title could be made (not a numeric range)
wsform-mwoption-out-of-range: No page title could be made (out of range)
wsform-mwcreate-wrong-title: No page title could be made (parser responded as not possible)
wsform-mwcreate-wrong-title2: No page title could be made (parser responded as not possible)
apihelp-wsform-param-what: What action do you want to do? (getRange or nextAvailable)
apihelp-wsform-param-titleStartsWith: Title name to search for e.g. Invoice/
apihelp-wsform-param-range: When using getRange, define the range. Eg. 0000-9999
apihelp-wsform-example-1: Get the first free Title number in a range from 0-9999 and a Title that starts with Invoice
apihelp-wsform-example-2: Get the next available (highest) Title number that is free for a Title that starts with Invoice/
wsform-field-secure-not-available: <!-- secure config setting not set, skipping -->
wsform-config-not-found: Could not find the config file for WSForm. Please read the manual
wsform-config-credentials-not-found: We need all the API user credentials
wsform-return-outside-domain: The return value is outside the server domain. Cancelled
wsform-session-no-token: Did not receive a session token from the form.
wsform-session-no-equal-host: Form host and api host are not equal.
wsform-unverified-email1: You need to confirm your email account first.
wsform-unverified-email2: Please do it now by clicking on this link
wsform-anonymous-user: Please log in first.
wsform-docs-new-version-notice: There is a new version available for WSForm. Please contact your administrator so he can update this extension
wsform-docs-no-new-version-notice: There is no new version available for WSForm. The complete changelog is shown.
wsform-docs-new-version-table: Changelog from your version to this new version
wsform-captcha-score-to-low: Your Captcha score is to low. You form is not submitted
wsform-api-error-allpages: No allpages result from MediaWiki API
wsform-api-error-noquery-response: No query result from MediaWiki API
